entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to use a custom splash screen #16843
  • Unable to deploy only myApp to iOS device #16835
  • How to remove the radius at the edges in Shell Flyout in MAUI #16832
  • Label InputTransparent property in MAUI XAML is being ignored in windows only. #16831
    Backlog
  • How to move the Flyout so that it is parallel to the ContentPage.Title as macOS in .NET MAUI #16830
    Under Consideration
  • SelectedItem for Picker show default data when ItemSource is set from vm for windows #16827
  • Maui (.net 7) Android (apk) Button behaves differently in Debug and Release. #16825
  • Group in a CollectionView on windows does not span horizontally #16824
    Backlog
  • void VisualElement.Arrange(Rect bounds) doesn't arrange. #16823
    Backlog
  • [Android] NavigationPage.HasNavigationBar="False" doesn't work with TabbedPage #16816
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Grid with padding column misalignment #16815
  • Localizing app name on Windows papercut #16814
    Backlog
  • [.NET 9] Internalize/remove MessagingCenter #16813
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Html Label examples from Microsoft learn do not render correctly on either iOS or android #16810
    Backlog
  • Label().LoadFromXaml does not work when using Label.FormattedText #16809
    Backlog
  • Data is correct, but drawing is not correct. #16808
    Backlog
  • My control will never fit in any layout in MAUI application #16807
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.92] Button Content Layout goes wrong on Android #16806
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [regression/7.0.92] DataTemplate is very slow when created in code behind on Android #16805
    .NET 7 + Servicing

Closed

  • Carousel View doesn't update its hierachy tree on Windows with Loop set to False #9457
    Backlog
  • Checkbox Not Checked When Using Gesture Recognizer #16397
    Backlog
  • ScrollView Inside StackLayout Not Working in MAUI #12452
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Bug: Multiple platforms Editor & Entry Two Way binding to text #16636
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform CheckBox control 'IsChecked' #16721
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform Slider control 'Value' #16720
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform Label control - Multiple properties #16722
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform - Binding a property after an animation fails #16723
    .NET 8 GA
  • Memory Leak issue in ListView #16450
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_SQL Azure Data Studio_Database_Create Project from database_Screen reader: Screen reader is not announcing " section Headings" of "Create project from database" section. #16819
  • A11y_SQL Azure Data Studio_Connect to a SQL Server_AI4D: Name is not defined for "New Connection" and "New Server Group" button in the "Servers" section. #16812
  • A11y_SQL Azure Data Studio_Extensions - install_Screen reader: After invoking "Install" button Screen Reader is not announcing "Installation" status. #16817
  • A11y_SQL Azure Data Studio_Extensions - install_Screen reader: After invoking "Next" button Screen Reader is not announcing "Headings" of "Data-tier Application Wizard" section. #16820
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #16778
  • App Crash on starting - iOS Binding library - DYLD: Symbol not found #16811
  • CS1061 error in VS for Mac when referencing XAML views in code-behind #16659
  • ITextInput extensions for interacting with platform soft input (keyboard) #11565
    .NET 8 GA
  • Crashes in apps built with visual studio 17.6.* #16001
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Label text overlap in HorizontalStackLayout and Columns Grid #16658
    .NET 8 GA
  • Resizetizer is not working if you get a .DS_Store file inside you Fonts files folder #13452
    Under Consideration
  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView is not shown when parent IsVisible is switched to true #16304
    Backlog
  • Control Templates doesn't trigger TapGestureRecognizer for elements #16449
  • [regression/7.0.49] LinearGradientBrush not working on Android in Landscape orientation #16392
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_Orientation: At landscape orientation "New Recipe" heading is not visible clearly. #15317
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_ScreenReader: After changing the value for review, voice over is not announcing new value, it’s reading previous value. #15622
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_ScreenReader: Voice over is not announcing "Recipe Name" field as required field and not marked up with any chevron/symbol. #15627
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_NonTextContrast: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15628
    .NET 8 GA
  • ProgressBar height not changing #16553
  • Picker on Windows is endlessly Scrolling #16555
  • CollectionView's selected item and another control bound to the same property behave incorrectly #16582
  • Panning MAUI.Blazor on touch screen cause random crashes #16303
  • MessagingCenter is now internal in .net 8 #16714
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [windows] Fixed CarouselView items rendering #16842
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [BuildTasks] Fix resolution for nested types #16841
    area/Xaml </>
  • Make it more obvious how to use shell with sandbox #16840
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [windows] improve memory usage of `CollectionView` #16838
    area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Fix Grid cells not honoring MaxWidth #16837
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #16836
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [build] Manage extensions via maestro #16834
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Add note about ClipsToBounds/IsClippedToBounds #16833
    area/docs 📓
  • Remove reference to concrete native host app #16803
    area/hosting 🧩, community ✨, Under Consideration

Merged

  • [windows] fix memory leak in ListView #16762
    area/ListView, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.7.0 to 17.7.1 #16822
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [build] avoid NETSDK1195 error #16795
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Use the correct WASDK property #16793
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Document IElementHandler #16706
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16801
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Update CollectionView layout when reloading data #16794
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Revert "Internalize MessagingCenter (#12582)" #16798
    .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Add GetPosition method to DragStartingEventArgs, DragEventArgs, and DropEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [macOS] Don't force the RID to be x64-only #16678
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Just trying out some things #15000
    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen
  • Loading images needs the screen scale #14807
    area/image :framed_picture:, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Essentials: Port Xamarin.MediaGallery #13564
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen, control-dialog, Under Consideration
  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • First draft of pulling apart text wrapping, max lines, and text overflow #10279
    area/controls 🎮, control-label, Under Consideration
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add a "VSCode" target to open the "maui.code-workspace". #16732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed the tab bar not hiding/showing if property changed #16653
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [core] use factory methods for registering services #16741
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Consolidate all the test handler construction #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • Document Brush & Colors #16738
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8 GA
  • Tests: Add support for connected component analysis #16770
    do-not-merge, area/testing, community ✨
  • Enable Windows device tests on net7.0 #16756
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Notify Shell tab title changes #16593
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue on DisplayPromptAsync #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Remove the explicit RID on Mac Catalyst samples #16765
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
